about_the_game:
You know the reason of the world
The journey begins to stop this dreamy, twisted and mysterious 'black sea' here.

In this world where Ichi makes the world and lives in the world's Ichi, a sea in the form of a huge black curtain that appeared one day in the Great Desert of the West.
This 'black sea' is getting closer, devouring everything around it...
Get through this puppet show by defeating visionaries and their inner puppets who use the power of their dreams.


  • The twisted world and three unique characters
"It's a new doll. It's good to watch"
Step forward with three protagonists with different abilities and strengths in the twisted and dreamy "Black Sea," the magenta flower "Hongdanhyang," the golden hand "Georc," and the dreamer "Eris."


  • a variety of individual cards
Make your own deck with more than 60 cards given to each protagonist to win
You have to choose and choose the power to defeat the enemy and the power to help our allies.
Find the power you want and complete it.

  • Three-person multi-play and maps that require cooperation and strategy
"The price is one thing to dream together."
Play with colleagues who are not alone.
The direction of the story is multiple branches, not one. Choose and choose together, and in combat, use turns together to prevent enemy attacks and help our allies.

  • a diverse and powerful enemy
"We are the first people and the owners of this land."
Dreaming to live, they are living to dream. They will also stand as actors in this puppet show.
They will deal with you in various combinations and even their chief visionaries will be different every time.

The owner of the puppet show is always watching you. Looking forward to the day we meet...
